title: North Hunterdon-Voorhees Regional High School District and Evolution Labs Launch Platform to Help Students and Parents Achieve Better High School Outcomes
text:
Next-generation web and mobile engagement platform gives students and parents the tools they need to survive and thrive.
Morristown, NJ (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Evolution Labs today announced that the North Hunterdon-Voorhees Regional High School District has launched two of the company’s multi-faceted digital programs, which leverage web, mobile app, mobile messaging and social media to help students and parents navigate a range of issues, from social media bullying to sexual assault to health and wellness. North Hunterdon High School and Voorhees High School students access the program by downloading an app or by accessing a mobile-optimized website. Parents will be invited to participate at a later date.
The programs, which are known to users as North360 and Voorhees360, are built on Evolution Labs’ H360 and P360 platforms. The platforms enable high schools to offer a highly immersive content experience that can be tailored to individual schools, while drawing on nationally recognized best practices. The programs use an array of content vehicles, including short, expert-written topics, engaging videos, interactive self-tests and curated social media content. Program topics include: recognizing violent relationships, helping parents cope with a bullied (or bullying) child, bystander intervention, stress management, substance abuse, diet, academic honesty, college prep and concussion education for student-athletes.
“These innovative programs promise to be vehicles that will allow us to provide both students and parents with the right content at the right time throughout the school year,” said Ron Peterson, Principal, Voorhees High School. “Web and social media have brought their share of challenges to high school students. Programs like North360 and Voorhees360 provide an opportunity for us to tap into the power of digital media with a positive message,” said Rich Bergacs, Principal, North Hunterdon High School.
The platforms deliver new topics throughout the year, via email, SMS and in-app messaging. Each month, students must also complete a required topic, including a pre- and post- assessment to determine the extent to which they’ve absorbed the subject matter.
“North Hunterdon-Voorhees is a pioneer among school districts in embracing new technologies,” said Peter Kraft, Co-Founder at Evolution Labs. “The teams at both high schools continue to impress us with their commitment to employing the full range of features in our platform in order to make a material impact on how students (and their parents) experience high school.”
About Evolution Labs
Evolution Labs is changing the way students engage with schools and the way schools engage with students. Its proprietary software platform helps high schools and colleges recruit, enroll and retain students and their parents (driving key institutional goals and student learning outcomes). The company's Suite360 engagement platform provides institutions with technology and a highly immersive content experience to better connect with students while driving more successful educational outcomes. Learn more at http://www.evpco.com .
About North Hunterdon-Voorhees Regional High School District
The North Hunterdon-Voorhees Regional High School District, a district committed to innovation, personal excellence, high achievement, and community partnership, provides all students with personalized opportunities through a broad spectrum of exemplary educational experiences to develop their fullest potential, to foster lifelong learning, and to become responsible citizens in a continually changing society.
